title: Deron Miller - Acoustified! (2013)
description:
Deron Miller - Acoustified! (2013)

Acoustified! is the first solo album from front man/guitarist for CKY, Deron Miller. The album features acoustic interpretations of songs taken from Miller's previous bands CKY, Foreign Objects and Oil, as well as a cover of a My Bloody Valentine song. The album was released December 9, 2013, and December 11th for iTunes and Amazon. The album was funded by an Indiegogo campaign.
